EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-10-10 Unlock Cloud Elasticity to Lower Cloud Bills - Live Demo.es ew 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Do you want to lower cloud spend?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, I wanted to personally reach out to you about today's webinar "How to Unlock Cloud Elasticity to Lower Cloud Bills <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-eq/]]>". I know how easily your monthly cloud bills can get out of hand, and I'd like to show you how automation goodness with Turbonomic can help. In this 30-minute session at 11 am ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-eq/]]>, I will share:
- What is the difference between cloud scalability and cloud elasticity - How to determine the right compute & storage templates in AWS or Azure - How to push the bounds of cost optimization in the cloud
- How to automate workload scaling based on your percentile or time preferences
This time may help you deliver a truly elastic infrastructure and lower cloud bills monthly by 30% or more. I hope to (virtually) see you there.
All the best,
Eric Wright Director of Technical Marketing, Turbonomic
